summary: Paris is the capital of France and a very important city in Europe. It has over 2 million people living there and is known for its culture, food, and fashion. Paris has been a major center for many things since the 1600s, like finance, diplomacy, and art. It's also called the City of Light because it was one of the first cities to have street lights. Paris is home to famous museums like the Louvre, which is the most-visited art museum in the world. The city also hosts big sports events like the Olympics and the French Open tennis tournament.
title: Paris
